protocol.name: P-G4746-1
protocol.text: 2-week-old seedlings were treated with 20 ul ddH2O for 30 minutes, with gentle shaking.

protocol.name: P-G4746-2
protocol.text: 2-week-old seedlings were treated with 20 ul 0.5 mM chitooctaose (with a final concentration of 1 uM) for 30 minutes, with gentle shaking.

protocol.name: P-G4746-3
protocol.text: Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-G4746-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 7 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-G4746-5
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 20 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on Affymetrix GeneChip Arabidopsis Genome Array ATH1. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-G4746-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.

protocol.name: P-G4746-7
protocol.text: Seedlings (~ 30 seeds at the beginning) were grown hydroponically in a 50-ml falcon tube containing 10 ml of liquid medium (1X Murashige and  skoog basal salt mixture + 2% dextrose, pH 5.8). The tube was incubated with gentle shaking in a growth chamber  with the following settings: constant light at 125 umol m-2 s-1 at a temperature of 23 C.
